channel.title: Offline Server needed help
channel.description: So I have compile and the build was successful for client and server. I also did port forward correctly but I don't know why I keep getting "[java] java.net.ConnectException: Connection refused: connect". I'm not sure what to do anymore. Anyone help?

item.title: Offline Server needed help
item.dc:creator: @Vibes Vibes
item.description:
@Vibes wrote:

if you believe you have port forward and all set correctly, then it could be a firewall or your router. Check to see if you are allowing the port through the firewall.

Read full topic
